name: Crisp Grid
author: Crisp Themes

sections.description:
Free WordPress post grid plugin where you can display the latest posts in your website using a shortcode with custom options and also responsive on all devices. Custom post types supported.

  • Display the grid with a shortcode anywhere.
  • Custom options for each grid.
  • Select the post type you want to display.
  • Multi columns with maximum of 6.
  • Enable/Disable featured image.
  • Can hide the date.
  • Option to hide the author name.
  • Excerpt can be disabled.
  • Custom excerpt length.
  • Disable Read More link
  • Custom Read More link text.

sections.installation:
Automatic – Download the plugin file by clicking here. Login to your WordPress dashboard. Go to Plugins > Add New, click on “Upload Plugin” at the top, browse the plugin zip file which you downloaded. Upload and Activate the plugin.

Manual – Click here to download the plugin. Unzip the file and upload the folder crispgrid to /wp-content/plugins/. Login to your admin dashboard, go to Plugins, find the plugin name “Crisp Grid”, click on Activate.
